glsa.title: PySAML2: Security bypass
glsa.synopsis: A vulnerability in PySAML2 might allow remote attackers to bypass authentication.

background.p: PySAML2 is a pure python implementation of SAML2

description.p: It was found that the PySAML2 relies on an assert statement to check the userâ€™s password. A python optimizations might remove this assertion.

impact.p: A remote attacker could bypass security restrictions and access any application which is using PySAML2 for authentication.
